Description_lang: Damage-dealing spells and abilities have a chance to summon a ghostly tiger to fight by your side.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage-dealing spells and abilities have a chance to summon a ghostly tiger to fight by your side.  Only works in Krasarang Wilds.

description_blz.en_US: Damage-dealing spells and abilities have a chance to summon a ghostly tiger to fight by your side.
description_blz.es_MX: Los hechizos y facultades que infligen daño tienen una probabilidad de invocar a un tigre fantasma que luchará a tu lado.
description_blz.pt_BR: Habilidades e feitiços que causam dano têm chance de evocar um tigre fantasmagórico para lutar ao seu lado.
description_blz.de_DE: Schadenszauber und -fähigkeiten haben eine Chance, einen geisterhaften Tiger zu beschwören, die an Eurer Seite kämpft.
description_blz.en_GB: Damage-dealing spells and abilities have a chance to summon a ghostly tiger to fight by your side.
description_blz.es_ES: Los hechizos y facultades que infligen daño tienen una probabilidad de invocar a un tigre fantasma que luchará a tu lado.
description_blz.fr_FR: Les sorts et techniques qui infligent des dégâts ont une chance d’invoquer un tigre fantomatique qui se bat à vos côtés.
description_blz.it_IT: Gli incantesimi e le abilità che infliggono danni hanno una probabilità di evocare una tigre fantasma che combatte al tuo fianco.
description_blz.ru_RU: Наносящие урон заклинания и способности могут призвать вам на помощь призрачного тигра.
description_blz.ko_KR: 공격 주문 및 능력 사용 시 일정 확률로 유령 호랑이가 소환되어 곁에서 함께 싸웁니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 施放傷害法術和技能時有一定的機率召喚出一隻虎靈與你並肩作戰。
description_blz.zh_CN: 伤害性法术和技能有一定几率召唤出幽灵猛虎，和你并肩作战。
